movie.title: Bad News Bears
movie.writer: Bill Lancaster (screenplay), Glenn Ficarra (screenplay), John Requa (screenplay), Bill Lancaster
movie.actors: Billy Bob Thornton, Greg Kinnear, Marcia Gay Harden, Sammi Kane Kraft
movie.plot: Morris Buttermaker, an alcoholic pest removal worker and former professional baseball player (for a very short time), is recruited to coach and train a failing baseball team of 12-year-olds which is about to be thrown out of the league.
